Don't waste your money.

Good idea, wrong execution. genuine review i played this game for over 200 hours(as a killer and survivor) and every time im just frustrated after 3 games and have to turn it off. im generally not a ragequiter but this game is just sometimes too much. Developers think "they did a pretty good job so far" but they dont listen to the players really. they focus on new content that brings them more money instead of focusing on core game mechanics. the hitboxes are a joke, Servers are horrible to the point where having higher ping as a killer can be considered a advantage and there are many bugs happening on a regular basis. chackers can easily break your game expierience and not be punished for it because the game support basically does nothing. all of this reflects on the community in this game and thats why its considered very toxic, and in fact it really is sometimes.
overall i would say that if u want to achieve something in this game (reach higher ranks) u have to invest a lot of time and nerves. there is nothing more discouraging than being tunnelled out of a game and only having little measures to counter it. You are going to come across all of them - Facecampers,tunnelers,proxicampers,chackers,sweating players that are going to absolutelly obliterate your ambitions and teammates with the reasoning of a potato. Im not gonna say that its all bad tho, u can have fun in this game if u dont play competetive (which at least for me just doesnt work). and the all-platform crossplay is definetly a good selling point for people that just want to have fun with their friends.
Best Horror PVP game ever

Es un juego 4 vs 1 donde se supone el asesino tenga que meterles miedo o muchisima presion al superviviente pero lamentablemente no pasa eso por el total desbalance que hay habiendo solo 3 asesinos que practicamente pueden infundir miedo si  los usas bien pq son dificiles, mapas donde practicamente das un paso y tenes un pale uno tras otro como hawkings o midwitch (dando total facilidad frente al asesino como super y un dolor de cabeza como asesino pq literalmente hacen w+ space y te stunean una tras otra, que si lo podes dejar ir pero te van a hacer lo mismo pq son mapas plagadisimos de pales y a veces es imposible agarrarlos)  y en otros mapas para  el colmo grandes y abiertos a veces aparecen menos de 7 siendo practicamente imposible loopear al asesino (esto dependiendo de cual sea claro pero en general a menos que allÃ¡ una cabaÃ±a no vas a poder loopear y vas al suelo asegurado), perks desbalanceadisimas que basicamente son las que mas se ven (Fajador,Inquebrantable, golpe decisivo, tiempo prestado) en algunos casos no sirven contra cierto asesino pero se ven tanto y digamos estan "rotas" pq no hay limitaciones para usarlas te pueden tocar 4 monos con esas 4 y ya fuiste, sumado a que te saquen objetos con accesorios chetadisimos y gg partida (caja de herramienta espaciosa con recambio nuevo + aumento de velocidad de reparacion considerablemente o botiquin morado con aumentos de velocidad de curacion u otros objetos con accesorios rotisimos) pq te ponen uno de los mencionados sobre todo la caja de herramienta con recambio y te hacen 1 motor en 10 segs solo con los recambios, aunque tmb como super a veces pasa lo ya mencionado que vas caminando no ves un pale en todo el mapa y vas al piso, eso tmb da mucha bronca, pero la mayor parte del desbalance es del super pq tienen 99% probabilidades de escapar y el asesino practicamente 1/10 capaz se hace una partida con 3 o 4 asesinados.
Puntuacion: 5/10 
Pd: tiene potencial pero con tanto desbalance, trolls/ toxicos (no lo mencione pq es un tema aparte que en si no es culpa de los desarrolladores) a veces lo hace injugable.

This game is very fun to play especially when you're with friends.
I very much enjoy this game, and have since the moment I bought it in Feburary. It quickly became the main game I play on stream, and off stream as well.

I will tell you the truth this game is hard for both sides at beggining but if you get good as survivor you will win most matches on your own.If you progress as killer not meta killer but average or bad like hell raiser or clown you will get owned ewery time in high ranks no mater how good you are time will play againts you ewery time.
This is one scenario i was chasing one good player and he was looping me around palet 5 times than droped it on my head i was chasing him to another there can be like 25-30 palets so he escaped so i have chased him another 15 secconds to seccond pallet same scenario again than he got away with only one injury and unhoocked his friend i was casing him 3 minutes finaly i got him down picked him up bam he stabed me with decisive strike so he escaped again so here we go again anther looping around pallets i was finaly able to down him after another 3 minutes i had picked him up no hook close so i was bringing him to closest but what happend he got away how? I was barely able to bring him up to the hook to hook him but there was his buddy blocking hook i hit him but guy on my back escaped because ihe wiggled free so both escaped.
